verses.roman:
mādhava, vāsudeva-ghoṣa,-dui sahodara
nṛtya karena tāhāṅ paṇḍita-vakreśvara

synonyms: mādhava—Mādhava; vāsudeva-ghoṣa—Vāsudeva Ghosh; dui sahodara—two brothers; nṛtya karena—dances; tāhāṅ—there; paṇḍita-vakreśvara—Vakreśvara Paṇḍita.
translation: Two brothers named Mādhava Ghosh and Vāsudeva Ghosh also joined this group as responsive singers. Vakreśvara Paṇḍita was the dancer.
